page.title: 15A school-child's average day
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 to the sound of my alarm clock, dress in my school clothes and have breakfast of cereal, toast and coffee. I pack my bag and set off for school at 8.35 and meet a friend and we walk to school together. It opens at 8.50 and the teacher blows a whistle and we go to our classroom. We start with the attendance register and then school assembly and morning work is maths, english,reading lab or mental arithmetic we write our work in an exercise book with felt tip pen. At 12.00 we have lunch in the hall and then play until 1.15, tag games are my favourite. In the afternoon we do science, art or social studies, I like painting best. We go home at 3.30 and I have a little snack and then go out to play until 5.00 then I have tea, watch children's t.v. do my piano practice and go to bed at 8.30p.m.
